allocatedSupply().details: PUBLIC FACING: ERC20 totalSupply() is the circulating supply and does not include any staked Hearts. allocatedSupply() includes both.

currentDay().details: PUBLIC FACING: External helper for the current day number since launch time

dailyDataRange(uint256,uint256).details: PUBLIC FACING: External helper to return multiple values of daily data with a single call. Ugly implementation due to limitations of the standard ABI encoder.

returns.list: Fixed array of packed values uint256[] memory list

dailyDataUpdate(uint256).details: PUBLIC FACING: Optionally update daily data for a smaller range to reduce gas cost for a subsequent operation

params.beforeDay: Only update days before this day number (optional; 0 for current day)

globalInfo().details: PUBLIC FACING: External helper to return most global info with a single call. Ugly implementation due to limitations of the standard ABI encoder.

stakeCount(address).details: PUBLIC FACING: Return the current stake count for a staker address

stakeEnd(uint256,uint40).details: PUBLIC FACING: Closes a stake. The order of the stake list can change so a stake id is used to reject stale indexes.

params.stakeIndex: Index of stake within stake list

stakeGoodAccounting(address,uint256,uint.details: PUBLIC FACING: Unlocks a completed stake, distributing the proceeds of any penalty immediately. The staker must still call stakeEnd() to retrieve their stake return (if any).

params.stakeIndex: Index of stake within stake list
